title: Architecture Typeface = Romana
content:
Hello everybody.

I was wondering if you would be able to help me identify this typeface.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150112051616im_/http:/typophile.com/files/photo(2)_4330.jpg)

I would be extremely grateful.  
Sorry about the poor image quality, iphone image.

Best,  
James
author: jamesaallen

comments.content:
Some sort of De Vinne.

hhp

Thanks hrant.  
Anybody happen to know the exact version of De Vinne it is?

You got the name right, PMojo, but I think the Bitstream version of Romana is a better match:

[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/romana/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150112051616/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/romana/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/romana/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150112051616im_/http:/typophile.com/files/romana_6299.jpg)

Thank you so much guys! That is perfect.  
Thank you again!
